Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 131st Langley
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temp rerouted via 133rd Place, 134th Street, Indiana, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 131st Langley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 133rd Place, 134th Street, Indiana, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 131st Langley.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
